meanings.definition: A large-headed nail used for securing doors.
meanings.sent1: I hammered the doornails into the door to keep it shut.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter always keeps a box of doornails handy for his projects.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play with the shiny doornails, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: The doornails stood out against the dark wood, like little soldiers guarding the door.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the hammer hitting the doornails echoed through the house.

meanings.sent1: The old battery in the remote was dead as a doornail.
meanings.sent2: After the long hike, I was dead as a doornail and just wanted to rest.
meanings.sent3: The phone battery was dead as a doornail, so I couldn't call for help.
meanings.sent4: The fire in the fireplace was dead as a doornail, leaving the room cold and dark.
meanings.sent5: The plant had been forgotten and was now dead as a doornail in the corner.
